div.div: Occurrence records used to generate maps of Current Potential Habitat and Future Potential Habitat (modeling records) and records to evaluation the models (evaluation records).
div.p: Georeference (latitude and longitude), source and author of occurrence records used to generate the CPH and FPH models and for evaluation the models.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Principal Component Analysis and Pearson correlation.
div.p: Result of the analyzes used for the selection of environmental variables.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Maxent output of Current Potential Habitat and Future Potential Habitat.
div.p: Maxent output with values of threshold, AUC, percentage of the predicted area and number of occurrences used to generate the Current Potential Habitat and Future Potential Habitat model.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Results of Ecological Niche Models evaluation (ENMeval).
div.p: Output from the ENMeval package of the model used for CPH (best model) and general values of 14 for each set of variables.
Click here for additional data file.

div.div: Output of the ntbox used to evaluate the AUCratio of CPH and FPH.
div.p: Values of AUCratio for a AUCrandon (at level of 0.5) and the AUCatual (calibrating 5% of omission and 1000 bootstrap interactions).
Click here for additional data file.

Cordeiro, RTS; Amaral, FMD. Ocorrência de cnidários construtores de recifes em ambientes de profundidade no Nordeste do Brasil. In: Abstracts of XIV Congreso Latinoamericano de Ciencias del Mar, 2011, Balneário Camboriú - SC, Brazil.
Click here for additional data file.
